name: Premium Wireless Headphones
desc: Immerse yourself in crystal-clear audio with our state-of-the-art wireless headphones. Featuring advanced active noise cancellation technology, these headphones deliver studio-quality sound with deep bass and crisp highs. Enjoy 30-hour battery life, plush memory foam ear cushions, and seamless Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity. Perfect for audiophiles and professionals alike.

name: Advanced Smart Watch
desc: Stay connected and optimize your health with our flagship smartwatch. This feature-packed wearable offers comprehensive fitness tracking including heart rate monitoring, sleep analysis, and SpO2 measurement. With smartphone notifications, GPS tracking, and 7-day battery life, it's your perfect companion for both workouts and daily productivity. Water-resistant up to 50m.

name: Pro Gaming Mouse
desc: Dominate the competition with our professional-grade gaming mouse. Engineered for precision with a 12,000 DPI optical sensor and 6 programmable buttons. The ergonomic design reduces fatigue during extended gaming sessions, while customizable RGB lighting lets you personalize your setup. Ultra-responsive mechanical switches ensure lightning-fast clicks.

name: Ergonomic Laptop Stand
desc: Elevate your workspace with our premium aluminum laptop stand. Designed by ergonomics experts, this stand improves posture by raising your screen to eye level while enhancing airflow to prevent overheating. The sturdy yet lightweight design supports laptops up to 17" and folds flat for easy transport. A must-have for home offices and coworking spaces.
